lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee's decision to let individual  sport federations decide whether to ban Russians from the Rio games over doping has put Moscow's links to the governing bodies under scrutiny.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Scrutiny on Global Sport Bodies as They Decide Russians' Olympic Fates
headline.main: Exclusive: Scrutiny on Global Sport Bodies as They Decide Russians' Olympic Fates

snippet: The International Olympic Committee's decision to let individual  sport federations decide whether to ban Russians from the Rio games over doping has put Moscow's links to the governing bodies under scrutiny....
